CustomField.description:
E2B (R2): B.4.k.1, drugcharacterization (1N)
E2B (R3): G.k.1 Characterisation of Drug Role Conformance: Required Data Type: 1N OID: 2.16.840.1.113883.3.989.2.1.1.13 Value Allowed: 1 = Suspect 2 = Concomitant 3 = Interacting 4 = Drug Not Administered
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Characterization of the drug as provided by primary reporter. All spontaneous reports should have at least one suspect drug. If the reporter indicates a suspected interaction, interacting should be selected. All interacting drugs are considered suspect.
CustomField.label: Characterization of Drug Role
